summary: The eight remaining survivors of a secret research facility barricade themselves away from a horde of ancient and deadly creatures.
cast: Tonia Renee Hammerich|Bret Kennedy|Ozzie Devrish|Roslyn van Doorn|Dirk Foulger|Anthony Edwards|Davyd Williams|Cassia Rosenstraus|Aash Aaron|Christian Newling|Kit Sivyer|Gregory Connors|India Gaythwaite|Ulrik Strodl|Stephen Daddow|Damien Bryson|Hollie Johnson|Philippe Deseck|Jodi Plumbley|John Cross|Mason Hoffman|Joel Amos Byrnes
keywords: head blown off|australian science fiction|australian horror|australian fantasy|alien
title: The Dark Lurking
